name: Baby Worlds Eater
description:
Baby Worlds Eater

You're a Baby Worlds Eater, you get joy in eating hoomans flash and consuming their souls.

Eat all hoomans in a city and your father, Cthulhu, will reward you with another one

Try not to eat your follower!

You have a limited time since walking with the living cost you much energy.

Each time you complete a level, you get a new one to play, each player will get random levels, so feel free to share your level with other players. Just copy the link and give it to your friends or share it on twitter/facebook/etc.

Use arrows/wsad/hjkl to move.

This is my entry for the 7drl 2020.
